page.title: 02A Day In My Life In Woolton
page.content: I usually get up at 7.10 a.m. every morning. I get washed and dressed and go down to watch Breakfast{Television. When it has finished I make my lunch. When my mother comes down, the family have breakfast. When it is about 8.45 a.m. I set off for{school}in the car with my sister. When we get to school we go straight through into assembly. We have playtime in the morning and afternoon. After lunch the boys like to play {football.}During the day we have many lessons. When I come{home}I feed my{rabbit} and then I do my half hour practice on the organ. After that I play football and then have dinner. After my dinner I play football again. Then I come in and get in the bath, after which I watch television until 9.00 p.m. NEIL COLQUHOUN (9)
